summary: This document is a suicide watch observation log for inmate Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. It records observations of his behavior and condition in his cell at regular intervals, beginning on July 23, 2019, shortly before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate who is the subject of the suicide watch observation log at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.

events.title: Suicide watch observation begins
events.description: A suicide watch chronological log is initiated for inmate Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was placed on suicide watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The suicide watch observation log began on July 23, 2019.
The log documents regular observations of Epstein's behavior in his cell, noting activities like sitting on his bed, standing at the door, and looking at pictures.
The document is a standard Bureau of Prisons form for monitoring inmates at risk of self-harm.
This log was created in the period immediately preceding Epstein's death in August 2019.
